title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.13.0.4 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2019-7-28 19:33 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft 基岩版 1.13 仍未发布，1.13.0.4为其第3个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360031240811-Minecraft-Beta-1-13-0-4-Xbox-One-Windows-10-Android-
Fixes:bug修复
修复了64个bug（此版本没有任何内容更新，仅是修复bug）
Crashes/Performance崩溃/性能
Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复了游玩时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that happens when quick moving a structure void block (MCPE-47903)修复了快速移动结构空位时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when blocking projectiles with a shield (MCPE-48070)修复了用盾牌格挡弹射物时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could sometimes occur when approaching world spawn (MCPE-46686)修复了靠近世界出生点时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur on Xbox when changing internet connection修复了在Xbox上改变连接状态时可能发生的崩溃问题Improved performance and stability when playing on split-screen on Xbox改善在Xbox上使用分屏游玩时的性能和稳定性

General常规
Fixed minecart rider rotation not being updated correctly on some packs修复了某些包上矿车旋转时骑车者位置没有正确更新的问题Fixed third person camera view shaking issue (MCPE-48987)修复了第三人称时相机鬼畜的问题Adjusted player sneak animation position调整了玩家潜行后的动画位置Players can join the world correctly after accepting an invite玩家可以在接受邀请后正常地加入世界Nether portals now connect properly after being cloned下界传送门现在可以在克隆位置后正常连接到原本的位置Fixed the animation of nausea (including using nether portals) (MCPE-47960)修复了反胃动画效果不生效的bug（包括使用下界传送门的时候）Added mirror back to left arm in humanoid geometry (MCPE-47944)添加了人形几何体的镜像左臂翻转效果Split-screen players can only join if they have an adequate controller available现在只有在拥有足够的控制器才能使用分屏游玩The correct Marketplace Inventory items are now shown when switching users切换用户时会正常显示市场库存物品Fixed broken rotations in player animation for attacking修复了玩家攻击动画的挥动旋转效果不显示的bugPlayers now face the specified direction when added to teleport commands（在任何地方）添加使用传送命令时，玩家会正常地面对指定的方向Fix issue of Damaged Elytra texture never getting used (MCPE-47758)修复了在鞘翅耐久为1的时候不能使用也不能摧毁的bug/clear now works correctly with damageable items/clear指令会正确清理受损物品Global Resource Packs in Settings will now update to the new chosen language设置中的全局资源包选项加入多语言支持Throwing animation now plays when charging trident with riptide使用蓄满力的激流三叉戟时，投掷动画会正确地播放Corrected player sprint/swim state when exiting water修复了玩家离开水面时的冲刺/游泳状态Fixed an issue with making purchases on Oculus Rift修复了在Oculus Rift上的购买问题Fixed a controller issue when docking the Nintendo Switch修复了与Nintendo Switch控件对接时的问题Left and right brackets on world/friend/server tabs now function correctly with full keyboard controls toggled on修复了启用全键盘控制时无法在世界/好友/服务器选项上输入左右括号的问题The text to speech narrator now works correctly with punctuation in text boxes文本到语音的朗读人现在会正常使用文本框中的标点符号（半/全角）



Fixed an issue with in-game patch notes not always showing up correctly修复了游戏更新说明不会正常显示的问题Fixed an issue with some damageable items (such as armour, tools) not being suggested in recipe book修复了合成书中没有显示一些会损坏物品（如盔甲，工具）的问题Armour stands and players can again wear helmets with secondary layers盔甲架和玩家可以佩戴第二层头套Items no longer appear as mobs when held by armour stands (MCPE-48629)修复了盔甲架上面的物品会被识别成敌对物品的问题Arrows now render correctly when held by armour stands现在会正确渲染放在盔甲架上面的箭Removed the “Create Realm” button from beta versions of the game
在Beta版本中移除“创建领域”按钮

Gameplay游玩
Fixed an issue that was sometimes causing mobs to despawn randomly (MCPE-47922)修复了有时怪物会突然消失的问题Players no longer fall through opening shulker boxes and pistons (MCPE-47882)修复了直接穿过潜影盒掉下去的问题Items that have been smelted can now be crafted and stacked correctly (MCPE-47907, MCPE-48421, MCPE-47684)修复了烧制过后的物品无法正确堆叠和使用的问题Buttons are now craftable from recipe book again (MCPE-48584)
按钮可以从合成书中正常制作

Mobs怪物
Adult villagers can now get into beds with low ceilings成年村民现在可以在低天花板的床上睡觉（两格高）Creepers no longer lose aggro when line of sight is broken briefly爬行者在光线强度变化时不会再失去仇恨Removed the Fox “moveToVillage” behaviour to match Java删除了狐狸的“moveToVillage”行为以匹配Java版Mobs can now enter minecarts and boats again (MCPE-48596)怪物现在可以正常地进入矿车和船上Dolphins now jump properly again海豚现在会正常地跳跃Zombies no longer become stuck on doors僵尸不会再卡在门里The parrot dancing animation is now at the correct speed (MCPE-48356)修复了使用唱片机并播放音乐时鹦鹉跳舞动画太快的问题……Parrots can now fly correctly again (MCPE-47954)鹦鹉现在会正常地飞行Dolphins now follow players in boats again
海豚现在不会跟随在船上的玩家

Graphical
图形界面


Fixed cloud shading (MCPE-47814)修复云着色器问题（平面云跟体积云显示不正确）Fixed an issue with water not rendering correctly on some servers (MCPE-46813)修复了在一些服务器上无法正确渲染水流的问题Fixed the flame height issue when player in on fire (MCPE-48175)修正了玩家着火时的火焰高度问题Multiple blocks no longer change colour to black when moved by pistons使用活塞移动方块时，方块不会再变成黑色Using ‘/fill’ and ‘/clone’ commands with glass structures now render correctly
现在可以正常使用带有玻璃方块的结构的/fill和/clone命令

User Interface用户界面
Fixed directional arrow controls when using full keyboard gameplay setting (MCPE-47853)使用全键盘游玩时会将箭头控件固定一个方向，防止出现定位错误出现无法移动视角并鬼畜抖动的问题Removed accessibility tab from create world screen在创建世界的界面中删除辅助功能选项

Add-Ons and Script Engine附加包和脚本引擎
Ducks can once again be hit by the player in the MINECON 2018 Pack (not that you would, of course!)鸭子（雾）可以正常地被使用MINECON 2018皮肤包的玩家击打（当然这不是你想要的结果！）Fixed the positioning of particles that were only showing correctly when centered on screen修复了只有在屏幕中心时才能正常显示粒子位置的问题Adding back-compatibility for old player animation flags为旧的玩家动画标志进行向上兼容Experimental UI is registered as trusted pack (MCPE-47818)实验性玩法中的UI现在会注册成可信包，防止因为没有被信任而不加载代码Fixed horse rein positioning and rotation in certain packs
修复了马在某些包的位置和旋转方向不正确的问题

Fixed an issue with nested behaviour pack definitions not running correctly修复了嵌套行为包没有正确定义而不运行的问题Fixed an issue with minimum compatible versions of certain packs not working correctly修复了某些包的最低兼容版本设置不正确而无法正常工作的问题Timer component now works on vanilla projectiles计时器组件现在可以用于原版弹射物‘minecraft:spell_effects’ no longer trigger a second timer"minecraft:spell_effects"代码不会再触发第二个计时器Fixed an issue with the ‘must_see_forget_duration’ component not working修复了"must_see_forget_duration"组件无法正常工作的问题Fixed an entity collision issue that was affecting some marketplace maps修复了影响某些市场地图导致实体冲突的问题Invisible end rods (variant 6) used in various marketplace maps are now invisible again
所有市场地图中使用的末地烛（变种6）再次变为不可见
